headline: SoCalGas Donates $75,000 to Pasadena Chamber Foundation to Support Altadena Small Business Recovery Following Eaton Fire
summary: The Pasadena Chamber of Commerce Foundation (PCCF) announced today a $75,000 donation from Southern California Gas Co. (SoCalGas) to support small businesses in Altadena, California, impacted by the recent Eaton Fire.
